1.content:
Sonic was running through the forest one day when he found something on the side of the road. It was a box labled "The Remote of Swap". Sonic opend the box and found, suprise suprise, a remote. Sonic presumed this was the "Remote of Swap" the top refered too. It also had an instruction manual. If it was one of Robotnik's traps it wouldn't have an instruction manual. Sonic 'sped read' through it and learned about its different functions. The knob set too 5 was the relization knob.
5 ment no one would notice
4 ment only the people Sonic wanted to notice would notice
3 ment only those not effected by the swap would notice
2 ment only those effected by the swap would notice
1 ment everyone would notice
There was also a switch that was labeled "Hair"
1 ment only hair on head
2 meant only other hair would swap (Facial and body)
3 meant all ahir swapped
It was currently set to 3.
Something with this much detail and an "inclosed instruction book" (Mario reference in a Sonic fan-fic!?! *world explodes*) couldn't be a Robtnik trap. But just to be sure, Sonic tested it on...

131.content:
"Well, to do it, I have to... *grrr* Get to her place."

As he said those words, the blue blur ran directly to Amy's house front door.

She opened the door, quickly excited by Sonic's surprising presence.

"Hello... Sonic? *sweetly* Oh, you want to be with me, hm? I'm glad-"
.
"Huh, Amy? That isn't exactly why I'm here." said Sonic.

"*Ohh..., she said in a deceived tone. What is it? Eggman?"

"Nah, not even that."

"Well, what is it?" Amy said.

"Uh, first, just sit somewhere, I've got a surprise for you."

Amy was confused but slightly happy about that.

"So, why didn't you said that first? I thought you came because of a problem."

"I just wanted to clarify that wasn't about a date or something else but, as friends, I just wanted to be kind to you."

Amy thought Sonic was hiding a precious gift for her to secretely declares his love.

"OK, then, I will be on the couch."

"After that, said Sonic, close your eyes and wait for your surprise. Count in your head to ten."

"Alright."

Amy went to her living room and sat on the couch, like what was promised. Sonic pressed the life swap 2 button.

Did it worked?

He knew how to style Amy’s hair and put on her makeup and stuff like that. Sonic quickly found himself at Club Rouge. He spied Rouge through a window putting the finishing touches on her make up. Sonic had come just in time. He pointed through the window and fired. Rouge was still at the vanity table, only this time she was putting on Amy’s makeup. Sonic looked down and saw the skin suit clinging to him. Rouge’s suit had exaggerated some curves that he didn’t really have. Rouge’s heart shaped breastplate sat attached to Sonic’s flat chest like nothing was different. Rouge’s elbow length gloves were also on his arms, making them seem more feminine. Sonic was then a little surprised to see that he was in stand perfectly straight in Rouge's 4 inch heeled boots.

"Tom if you could excuse us?" Rouge asked.

"No prob." "Tom walked away with his hands in his pockets but once he got outside he whipped out his phone and Sonic and Rouge could clearly hear him. "Dude! I was just in the same room as Sonic and Rouge, AT THE SAME TIME! And I think Rouge is inot me."

1512322.content:
"What the!?" Sonic exclaimed. He had tried to swap with Shadow, but somehow he ended up wearing Rouge's skintight suit. He figured Rouge must have gotten in the way and he swapped with her instead, but upon closer inspection, instead of Rouge's boots, he found he was wearing Shadow's shoes. "Did I swap with both of them or something?"

Sonic looked back through the window, and to his surprise, both Rouge and Shadow were both still wearing their own clothes. Perhaps by somehow swapping with two people at once, his own clothes had simply disappeared. "Great. What am I supposed to do now?" Looking through the window again, Shadow was still there. His clothes were pretty similar to Sonic's old ones, and he had been aiming to swap with Shadow in the first place, so perhaps he should offload this copy of Rouge's outfit plus Shadows shoes onto him. Then again, also long as Sonic kept the remote, he could swap again whenever he wanted, so there was really no harm in keeping these clothes for a while, since his regular clothes were no longer available.

Sonic speed off torwards the house of Mina Mongoose. Mina had a bright future ahead of her as a singer and a hero. Her incredible vocal skils were only rivaled by her speed. After the flash, Sonic looked down and noticed he was now a girl and dressed in Mina's clothes, hair and all. Luckily his fur was still blue but his spikes had been replaces by Mina's long purple hair. Her name was Sonyc, Sonic with more emphisis on the "i". She was only a little slower than Sonic but had a great voice, mostly in singing. She liked kareoke but didn't intend on becoming a professional singer any time soon. Sonyc described her voice as "Her little gift to New Mobtropolis", playing small shows at local clubs and benifit concerts. She probably wanted to simply avoid the bright lights and didn't want ot get caught up in fame. Oddly enough, she still is famous. For stopping the various plots and scheme's of the evil Dr. Robotnik. She uses her incredible speed for good and justice, and still is able to live a (somewhat) normal life.

Minos was a yellow mongoose, slightly faster than most other mongoose in red running shoes and gloves. His name is pronouced like "Minus" but with an "o" insted of an "u". Like Sonyc, he is a good singer. The two have done some duets, but Minos managed to get further with his singing because he wants to get famous with it. The two have vowed to saty friends no matter who gets famous. Minos has also helped Sonyc with some missions but is considdered a side member of the team.

"Not this time. I'm here to talk about your Dad."

"What about my Dad?"

"Tails and Propeller (female Rotor) have thought of a way to derobotize him and save his life."

"HOW!?! And why are you telling me this?"

"Because I'm the reason this can work. Tails wants me to use chaos control so he, Propeller and Dr. Quack have enought time to operate and save him. Get your family, we're going to the hospital. Now." Sonic nodded and ran inside and told everyone the news. Everyone was excited and went downstares to have Shadow Chaos Control them to the operating room. There was Tails, Propeller and Doctor Quack, ready for the operation.

"Okay, everyone out. To you this will only be minutes." Dr. Quack said. Everyone left the room so jules could be operated on. "CHAOS CONTROL!" was all that was heard be for Shadow steaped out of the room too. Shadow hung around breifly too see if it was worth her time to try. Sonic sat in silence.

"What's wrong dear?" Sonic's mom came over and comfroted her.

"It's just... I'm nervous. Shadow said before we left home that Dad living isnt gaurentied, You heard her too."

"I'm surpriesd that my dauaghter is nervous about an operation, when she is the one who has stopped Dr. Eggwoman how many times again?"

"I don't know, but I see you point."

"Well what ever happens, we'll always stay together."

"All right mom." Sonic continued to sit in silence, untill the door opend again. Dr Quack stepped out and said. "We are finished." Then, behind Dr. Quack stood a blue hedgehog with blrown hair, in a red vest and red boots. http://tassietakerdesigns.com/wp-content... Bernie ran up and hugged him

"JULES YOUR BACK!!" Tears of joy beagn to role down her cheeks. Sonic then ran right into him

"DADDY!" Sonic exclaimed as hse hugged him as tight as he could. I never thought I'd see the day when I saw my beautiful daughter with real eyes. I love you, dear."

"I love you too Dad!" As uncle Chuck gave his embrace to Jules Sonic looked at Shadow, who had a slight grin on her face. "Thank you Shadow."

"Normaly I'm not into these soggy moments but. I think I'm actualy starting to choke up alittle. I guess you feel like i would fell if I got Mario (male Maria) back." Not much happened until that night when the family went to and Italian restaruant for dinner and invited Shadow, Tails, Propeller, and Dr. Quack over for the dinner.

Jules spoke up shortly before the food arived. "I'ld like to propose a toast to Dr. Quack, who operated on me and saved my life, Tails and Propeller, for aiding her in the surgery, and Shadow for making the whole operation possible.'' Everyone cranked their cups together and rank their drinks. When everyone got back they were all tired form the long day and went to bed rather quickly. Sonic, the next day woke up incredibly happy, she then noticed the remote on the night stand and deciced to have a little fun...
15521221112111.title: Shadow's info

155212211121112.content: The new world was cool, but some of it just didnt feel right, like Rouge and Espio's swap, or Cream and Big. Sonic got dressed in Mina's black and purple top and matching skirt and sped off. First was Rouge and Espio Unfprotunaly, the two werent near each tother so Sonic could do the swap. Sonic then noticed a picture of everyone together and used that to put Rouge and Espio back to normal. Next was Big and Cream who were near eachother because they were both hanging out with Adam, the male Amy. Sonic put them back and was then confronted by the next big problem, Adam. Amy got swapped with Charmy, but Charmy's personality seemed better as a female. Sonic though about this and Swapped Amy back with Vector. Finally there was Vinella, Cream's mom now Dad, who Sonic swapped with Eggwoman. At first Sonic thought Eggman couldnt get any uglier. Then he saw Eggwoman. Sonic was now 100 oercent happ with this world. Now what.
155212211121112.title: Gender Swap

1552122111211121.content: Sonic looked down at herself. She had some nice legs, but her cheast was only a B-cup. Then she rembered Shdow the other day had some D-cups, like Rouge. Sonic ran off in search of the two and found them at a reastaruant at an outside table, waiting to order. Sonic fliped the effect swaitch so no one would noticed the swap, but everyone would notice that Sonic has the bigger breastes, and thought about who's cheast she would take.
1552122111211121.title: Body part Swap?

15523.content: Sonic wanted to try being a female as he could just reverse it really fast if he didn't like it.But which girls' gender would he swap with?
15523.title: Gender

1553.content: who will he swap with
1553.title: Random Swap

choices: Try to undo the swaps with the remote
15533.content: Sonic with curiosity pressed the random swap button which caused the entire area around him to be engulfed in a blinding light, when he opened his eyes he looked around recognizing the area as Moebius with Sonic himself being in the body of a female Scourge with Amy's outfit on and Cream's personality...talk about random.
15533.title: other

choices: She wakes up to find the remote gone
She wakes up feeling fresh, decides to check out Moebius first
155332.content: Looking at the remote Sonic tried to figure out all of what happened, perhaps there was a way to pull up a log that showed all of the changes the remote had caused? Before she could investigate further however a knock came from a door behind Sonic that made her jump, "You better be sleeping in there!" The voice on the other end had the voice of an authoritative adult male, clearly it must be nighttime as Sonic suddenly was hit with a great amount of drowsiness as she fell on a bed to the side of her...
155332.title: Try to undo the swaps with the remote

choices: Miles remembers everything before the remote and how to work it
Miles needs Sonic to explain what the remote is
1553321.content: The next morning the hedgehog was shocked to discover her remote gone, chances are someone took it last night which gave her no choice but to leave the room and investigate. Sonic would slowly and quietly open the door to her room and poked her head out to see no one in sight, upon closing the door however she suddenly saw Miles standing behind her, "About time to woke up, I have some questions about the remote confiscated from your room last night." The Hedgehog gulped as she knew this was likely among the worst scenarios she could be in right now.
1553321.title: She wakes up to find the remote gone

info.brief_description: What happens when Sonic gets his hands on the remote once weld by Danny
info.description:
Sonic the Hedgehog finds the Remote of Swap this time, and of course swaps happen.
If you don't know who some of the characters are then search them on google images.

All of the buttons:
Body Swap: Swaps the tow peoples bodies
Life swap Swap two people's lives (Sonic uses it on Amy and Sonic now looks like Amy)
Life swap two: Swaps two people's lives (Sonic uses it on Amy and Sonic still looks like sonic but is living amy's life)
Wardrobe Swap: Swaps two people's wardrobes (Everything swaps! Makeup, jewlery, hair ect.)
Body part Swap: Swaps two people's body parts (Swaps what is aimed at)
Role reversal: Physical aperence doesn't change but is considdered the person swapped
Merger: Creates half and half versions of the people merged and user lives other person's life
Soul Swap: Swaps lives and clothes
Gender Swap: Swaps two people's genders (one boy and one girl required
Fun Swap: Swaps interestes and friends
Personality Swap: Swaps personality
World Swap: Swaps whole world at one time on one button (May go as unexpected)
Random: randomly swaps user with random othe person.
rules:
Two characters are allowed to go on dates but if you put them in a relationship with another character you can choose whom but don't be stupid (Shadcream). Other than that choose any but the fallowing are recomended
Sonamy
Tailcream
Knuxade (Knuckles and Shade)
Shadouge
Silaze
No sex
No death
Only furries may be swapped (Maria is an execption as well as Eggman)
Other Characters can appear from any of Sonic (Games, TV, and Comics)
No Fan characters
Curseing and Sexual content is allowed but keep it light.
Please, PLEASE! add chapters
Heve fun
info.pretty_title: Sonic and the Remote of Swap
